name: Oakland Housing Authority
description: Housing vouchers and public housing for low-income Oakland residents
fullDescription: The Oakland Housing Authority administers public housing and Section 8 vouchers for low-income Oakland residents.
whatTheyOffer:
- Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers
- Public housing communities
- Project-based vouchers
- VASH vouchers for homeless veterans
- Family self-sufficiency program
howToGetIt:
1. Check OHA website for waitlist openings
2. Apply when waitlist opens (usually online)
3. Must meet income limits
4. Oakland residents get preference
5. Wait for lottery selection
keywords: Oakland Housing Authority, OHA, Section 8, public housing, housing voucher, Oakland, low-income, waitlist
